reviews.review_msg: He's incredibly dry and arrogant.  Shows little enthusiasm towards his students.  Reading material is almost as dry as he is.

Some people aren't fond of his lecture style; he basically reads his notes off the page. But has a wealth of practical experience, tells interesting and entertaining stories, good at applying concepts to reality. Demands lots of writing which is intimidating at first, but rewarding in the long run. Made me even more interested in the subject.
